publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8209 Aileen Campbell: Youth Worker of the Year—That the Parliament congratulates Jayne Copland of Clyde Valley High School on being awarded Youth Worker of the Year by YouthLink Scotland and sends its best wishes to all the other nominees and recipients at the organisation’s fourth annual awards ceremony on 17 March 2011; considers that YouthLink Scotland, which has over 100 members including all local authorities and the majority of the national voluntary youth work organisations, plays an invaluable role in championing the value of the youth work sector in Scotland; recognises the contribution that youth workers make to supporting and improving the lives of young people across Scotland, and hopes that these awards will encourage more people to consider becoming involved in youth work. Supported by: Sandra White*, Rob Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Ian McKee*, Christine Grahame*
